p: To establish the relationship between the mRNA level and DENV titer, we detected the induced level of ROS-related genes under different DENV titer infections. We observed that a DENV titer of 10 3 Pfu/ml could not induce the up-regulation of any ROS-related genes. However, when the virus titer was increased to 10 5 Pfu/ml, there was an increase in HPX8A and DUOX2 expression from 2- to 6-fold. Interestingly, DENV infection leads to a 25-fold increase in CuSOD2 expression, while each of HPX7, HPX8B and HPX8C was increased by more than 200-fold ( Fig 3). Further, measurement of peroxidase activity at 1 d.p.i., revealed up-regulated activity of SOD, peroxidase and H 2O 2 at a titer of 10 6 Pfu /ml ( Fig 4).
